scripts.dev: VERSION=$(node -p "require('../../package.json').version") COMMIT=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) air --build.cmd "go build -v -trimpath -ldflags=\"-X github.com/starter-kit-fe/admin/constant.VERSION=${VERSION} -X github.com/starter-kit-fe/admin/constant.COMMIT=${COMMIT} -X github.com/starter-kit-fe/admin/constant.MODE=debug -s -w -buildid=\" -o ./tmp/admin ./cmd"
